alert.note: Alert for Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 08 at 6:40PM MDT until April 08 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning will expire at 7 PM today for fire weather zones 234, 236 and 237, which includes Kiowa, Prowers and Baca Counties... ...A Red Flag Warning has been issued from 11 AM to 9 PM Saturday for strong winds and low relative humidity values for fire weather zones 221, 222, 224, 226 through 233, 235 and 237...which includes the San Luis Valley, the I-25 corridor, and Crowley, Otero, Bent, Las Animas and Baca Counties... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 9 PM MDT SATURDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 237... ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 237... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 237. * Winds...Southwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Timing...until 7 PM this afternoon, 11 AM through 9 PM Saturday. * Relative Humidity...As low as 5 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands
